text: Jay Sterner Hammond (July 21, 1922 â€“ August 2, 2005) was an American politician of the Republican Party, who served as the fourth governor of Alaska from 1974 to 1982. Hammond survived a rafting accident on August 6, 1988, while shooting an episode of the series on the Tana River in Wrangell- St. Elias National Park. ==References== Category:1922 births Category:2005 deaths Category:Governors of Alaska Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:People from Troy, New York Category:Politicians from New York (state)
title: Jay Hammond
